meanings.definition: A collection of various items or articles.
meanings.sent1: The small shop sold a miscellaneum of souvenirs and gifts.
meanings.sent2: She organized her desk by placing all the miscellaneum in separate containers.
meanings.sent3: The miscellaneum of toys in the children's playroom made it a fun and colorful space.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a miscellaneum of memories, each one holding a different emotion.
meanings.sent5: The attic was a miscellaneum of forgotten treasures waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent1: The salad was a delicious miscellaneum of fresh vegetables and fruits.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting was a beautiful miscellaneum of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent3: The party was a miscellaneum of music, laughter, and dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a miscellaneum of styles, from casual to elegant.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a fragrant miscellaneum of flowers and herbs.
